title: Batty Malgoony's Mystic Carnivale
description: Come one! Come all! To be a part of the flabbergastly, magnificent, quirky, Batty Malgoony's Mystic Carnivale! Ladies and Gentlemen! Children of all ages! Batty is looking for artists of all ages to draw and create the mystical performers, unbelievable creatures and absurd characters in his 60-page book. In the book, the reader visits different parts of Batty's Mystic Carnivale and is asked to draw in the missing characters, creatures, or performers on each page. Batty's book is coming your way to creep you out, so get your imagination ready and throw in some silliness for this fun-filled drawing escapade. To learn more about Batty and his Mystic Carnivale visit his www.happilyeverart.com/BattyMalgoony....
author: K. Michael Crawford
